Dr. Memory
Download

Latest Build

For more recent bug fixes and features prior to the next official release, weekly builds are available (for Windows, only zip packages for portable/local installation are available: no installer is built) for recent commits. If there were no commits during the week, no build is generated that week.

Official Releases

Official Dr. Memory packages are hosted as GitHub releases.

The 2.5.0 release:

  • Dr. Memory installer for Windows (DrMemory-Windows-2.5.0.msi)
  • Dr. Memory zip file for portable/local installation on Windows (DrMemory-Windows-2.5.0.zip)
  • Dr. Memory for Linux (DrMemory-Linux-2.5.0.tar.gz)
  • Dr. Memory for Mac – alpha release (DrMemory-MacOS-2.5.0.tar.gz)

The prior 2.4.0 release:

  • Dr. Memory installer for Windows (DrMemory-Windows-2.4.0-2.msi)
  • Dr. Memory zip file for portable/local installation on Windows (DrMemory-Windows-2.4.0-2.zip)
  • Dr. Memory for Linux (DrMemory-Linux-2.4.0-2.tar.gz)
  • Dr. Memory for Mac – alpha release (DrMemory-MacOS-2.4.0-2.tar.gz)
